name: Dark Inoreader mods
description: A dark style for Inoreader, with highlights on current/unread articles

user.name: Sam Nordberg
user.about: Just upping some styles that I personally made for my convenience. They're not perfect, but I think satisfactory.

additional_info: Update: Customize your own colors now =================================== Description: The default Inoreader "dark" theme wasn't dark enough for me. I darkened most areas, added some brighter contrast colors, and now unread items are a blue shade, read items black, and current article (when navigating article list by keyboard) is a red shade. This is mainly for my personal use so I may tweak it if something bothers me. Note: This style should be applied with Inoreader's own dark theme.
